name: Revival (aram0112, DustinMaxwell, katie.roach, linabreining)
description:
Revival (aram0112, DustinMaxwell, katie.roach, linabreining) is an adventure game developed by katie.roach, aram0112 and DustinMaxwell. It was originally released in 2020.
Revival (aram0112, DustinMaxwell, katie.roach, linabreining) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
